item.title: Windows10 Ubuntu Dual System

item.title: The system cannot find the file specified(USB Drive Locked)
item.description: System: Windows Refer to youtube videos The system cannot find the file specified (USB Drive Locked). > diskpart # start DiskPart > list disk > select disk 1 # disk 1 is the usb flash > clean DiskPart has encountered an error: The device is not ready. See the System Event log for more information. > list disk > select disk 1 # re-select the disk > clean # re-clean DiskPart succeeded in cleaning the disk.

item.title: Mac tips
item.description: Shortcuts control + a to go beginning of a line control + e to go end of a line Terminal # calculate md5 checksum md5 /tmp/filename # calculate SHA-1 checksum shasum -a 1 filename # calculate SHA-256 checksum shasum -a 256 filename

item.title: 上传新项目到github上
item.description: 在本地文件夹下面的操作： cd you_work_directory git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" 在github网页端，新建一个仓库，但是不要初始化。接着执行 git remote add origin git@github.com:lylhw13/new_repository.git git push -u origin master

item.title: Commands summary
item.description: some commands If you want to write bytes then you should open the file in binary mode. f = open('/tmp/output', 'wb') append vs extend https://stackoverflow.com/questions/252703/difference-between-append-vs-extend-list-methods-in-python append: Appends object at the end. x = [1, 2, 3] x.append([4, 5]) print (x) gives you: [1, 2, 3, [4, 5]] extend: Extends list by appending elements from the iterable. x = [1, 2, 3] x.extend([4, 5]) print (x) gives you: [1, 2, 3,

item.title: Linux commands
item.description: some commands on arch journalctl -b -1 -r that will display the logs for your last boot (-b -1), starting at the last messages in the log (-r) shutdown shutdown -r #重启计算机（和reboot）命令一样 shutdown -h #关闭计算机并关闭电源（常用） shutdown -f #

item.title: My First Blog
item.description: 这是第一篇博客。 目标是通过博客来记录一下自己平时工作中遇到的技术问题及一些感受，希望可以帮助到一些遇到同样问题的人以及避免自己做一些无用功。

item.title: About
